verses.verse: The elder <S%G4245><s%> unto Gaius <S%G1050><s%> the beloved <S%G27><s%>, whom <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> love <S%G25><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> truth <S%G225><s%>.

Beloved <S%G27><s%>, I pray <S%G2172><s%> that <S%G2137><s%> in <S%G4012><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> thou <S%G4571><s%> mayest prosper <S%G2137><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> be in health <S%G5198><s%>, even as <S%G2531><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> soul <S%G5590><s%> prospereth <S%G2137><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I rejoiced <S%G5463><s%> greatly <S%G3029><s%>, when brethren <S%G80><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bare witness unto <S%G3140><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> truth <S%G225><s%>, even as <S%G2531><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> walkest <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> truth <S%G225><s%>.

Greater <S%G3186><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> I none <S%G3756><s%> than <S%G2443><s%> this <S%G191><s%>, to hear of my <S%G1699><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> walking <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%>.

Beloved <S%G27><s%>, thou doest <S%G4160><s%> a faithful <S%G4103><s%> work in whatsoever <S%G3739><s%> thou doest <S%G2038><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> them that are brethren <S%G80><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> strangers <S%G3581><s%> withal <S%G1519><s%>;

who <S%G3739><s%> bare witness <S%G3140><s%> to thy <S%G4675><s%> love <S%G26><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%>: whom <S%G3739><s%> thou wilt do <S%G4160><s%> well <S%G2573><s%> to set forward on their journey <S%G4311><s%> worthily <S%G516><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>:

because that <S%G1063><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> the sake <S%G5228><s%> of the <S%G846><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> they went forth <S%G1831><s%>, taking <S%G2983><s%> nothing <S%G3367><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>.

We <S%G2249><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> ought <S%G3784><s%> to welcome <S%G618><s%> such <S%G5108><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> we may be <S%G1096><s%> fellow-workers <S%G4904><s%> for the truth <S%G225><s%>.

I wrote somewhat unto <S%G1125><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> Diotrephes <S%G1361><s%>, who loveth to have the preeminence <S%G5383><s%> among them <S%G846><s%>, receiveth <S%G1926><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>.

Therefore <S%G5124><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> I come <S%G2064><s%>, I will bring to remembrance <S%G5279><s%> his <S%G846><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he doeth <S%G4160><s%>, prating against <S%G5396><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> with <S%G3056><s%> wicked <S%G4190><s%> words <S%G3056><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> content <S%G714><s%> therewith <S%G5125><s%>, neither <S%G3777><s%> doth <S%G1926><s%> he himself <S%G846><s%> receive <S%G1926><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> them that would <S%G1014><s%> he forbiddeth <S%G2967><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> casteth <S%G1544><s%> them out of <S%G1537><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%>.

Beloved <S%G27><s%>, imitate <S%G3401><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> that which is <S%G3588><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> that which is <S%G3588><s%> good <S%G18><s%>. He <S%G3588><s%> that doeth good <S%G15><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>: <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> that doeth evil <S%G2554><s%> hath <S%G3708><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> seen <S%G3708><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>.

Demetrius <S%G1216><s%> hath the witness <S%G3140><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G2532><s%>, and of <S%G5259><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> itself <S%G846><s%>: yea <S%G1161><s%>, <S%G2532><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> also bear witness <S%G3140><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> thou knowest <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> witness <S%G3141><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> true <S%G227><s%>.

I had <S%G2192><s%> many things <S%G4183><s%> to write <S%G1125><s%> unto thee <S%G235><s%>, but I am <S%G2309><s%> unwilling <S%G3756><s%> to write <S%G1125><s%> them to thee <S%G4671><s%> with <S%G1223><s%> ink <S%G3188><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> pen <S%G2563><s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> I hope <S%G1679><s%> shortly <S%G2112><s%> to see <S%G1492><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> we shall <S%G1492><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> face <S%G4750><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> face <S%G4750><s%>. Peace <S%G1515><s%> be unto thee <S%G4671><s%>. The friends <S%G5384><s%> salute <S%G782><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>. Salute <S%G782><s%> the friends <S%G5384><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> name <S%G3686><s%>.
